org.mixare.localMarker

Class SocialMarker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mixare.localMarker.LocalMarker
      • org.mixare.localMarker.SocialMarker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Marker>, Marker

    public class SocialMarker
extends LocalMarker
    The SocialMarker class represents a marker, which contains data from sources like twitter etc. Social markers appear at the top of the screen and show a small logo of the source.
    Author:
    hannes
